PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ServiceLife
PropertySetDef.Definition: Captures the period of time that an artifact will last along with various factors that impact the expected service life. HISTORY: Introduced in IFC2X4 as replacement for IfcServiceLife and IfcServiceLifeFactor.

PropertyDef.Name: ServiceLifeType
PropertyDef.Definition: ACTUALSERVICELIFE: The service life that an asset has given. EXPECTEDSERVICELIFE: The service life that an artefact is expected to have under current operating conditions. OPTIMISTICREFERENCESERVICELIFE: The best or most optimistic estimate of service life that is quoted for an artefact under reference operating conditions. PESSIMISTICREFERENCESERVICELIFE: The least or most pessimistic estimate of service life that is quoted for an artefact under reference operating conditions. REFERENCESERVICELIFE: The typical service life that is quoted for an artefact under reference operating conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: ServiceLifeDuration
PropertyDef.Definition: The length or duration of a service life.

PropertyDef.Name: QualityOfComponents
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the quality of components used.

PropertyDef.Name: DesignLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of design level employed.

PropertyDef.Name: WorkExecutionLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the quality of work executed.

PropertyDef.Name: IndoorEnvironment
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the indoor environment (where appropriate).

PropertyDef.Name: OutdoorEnvironment
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the outdoor environment (where appropriate)

PropertyDef.Name: InUseConditions
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the conditions in which components are operating.

PropertyDef.Name: MaintenanceLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: Adjustment of the service life resulting from the effect of the level or degree of maintenance applied to dcomponents.

PropertyDef.Name: MeanTimeBetweenFailure
PropertyDef.Definition: The average time duration between instances of failure of a product.
